short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: customize and generate retro animated blinkie gifs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
pretend it's y2k! customize retro animated blinkie graphics!

blinkies.cafe is a blinkie generator that lets you generate animated pixel gifs featuring whatever text you want. choose from dozens of styles - new styles are added weekly!

blinkie gifs are great for:
- badges for your website or blog, to show off your interests!
- eye-catching links on your streaming page!
- fun, sparkly messages in chat apps!
- flashy email & forum signatures!

blinkies are tiny, 150x20-pixel animated gifs used as badges to share interests and tell jokes! they were popular decorations in early-2000s geocities-era personal websites.

enjoy~

What's new:
0.0.1.10: added lots of new blinkies, 2x scale option, sort oldest first!
0.0.1.9: added option to toggle text splitting! added 7 new blinkies.
0.0.1.8: minor UI tweaks, added new blinkies
0.0.1.7: 
- expanded character set support for 日本語, 中文, 한국어
- longer text split over multiple lines
- cool space background
0.0.1.6: performance improvement, preview badge
